Based on the user's preferences, I would recommend 'Aladdin'. This classic Disney movie is known for its captivating story, memorable characters, and enchanting music.

The plot of 'Aladdin' revolves around a poor servant named Aladdin who lives in a desert with his best friend Mena.

One day while wandering in the desert, Aladdin finds an antique lamp hidden behind some rocks. While he is admiring the beauty of the lamp, suddenly a genie appears out of nowhere and grants Aladdin three wishes.

Hoping that his first wish will be about getting rid of Mena from his life as he loves her more than anyone else in his world, Aladdin says "I wish for Mena's death." Immediately after he says this wish aloud, suddenly the genie disappears into thin air leaving only an empty space where the genie disappeared.
